# Problem 2.23 {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A square bar of length L<sub>1</sub> = 10 in. and L<sub>2</sub> = 14 in. is pinned at one end and rests on a circular rod of diameter d = 5/8 in. A force F = 60 lb is applied at the free end. What is the average shear stress in the circular rod?
